blocks.data: Creates a batch of `Price List Assignments`.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

data.description: `Price List Assignments` object used in GET response.

customer_group_id.description: The Customer Group with which this price list assignment is associated. A customer_group_id of 0 indicates default pricing for the channel given in the request.

price_list_id.description: The Price List with which this price set is associated.

channel_id.description: The Channel with which this price set is associated. This field is optional or may be null when a price list applies across channels for the customer_group_id in the assignment.
